scripts.Oauthremove: cd Oauth && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf package-lock.json
scripts.Peopleremove: cd People && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf package-lock.json
scripts.Chatremove: cd Chat && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf package-lock.json
scripts.phoenixferemove: cd phoenixfe && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf package-lock.json
scripts.install: concurrently "npm run Oauthinstall" "npm run Peopleinstall" "npm run Chatinstall" "npm run phoenixfeinstall"
scripts.removen: concurrently "npm run Oauthremove" "npm run Peopleremove" "npm run Chatremove" "npm run phoenixferemove"
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run Oauth" "npm run People" "npm run Chat"
scripts.e2eApiTests: wait-on tcp:3001 && wait-on tcp:3002 && wait-on tcp:3002 && cd tests/apis && npm test
